Articles.Content: Is there anyway i can join. Im a youtuber myself and im doing a ksp war series as well

Is there anyway i can join. Im a youtuber myself and im doing a ksp war series as well

Sure, we can always see what part you can take in this. First of all, I assume you have a recording software since you are a youtuber. Now the question is, what time zone are you in? I want to get a sense of you availability in relation to our schedule.

Is there anyway i can join. Im a youtuber myself and im doing a ksp war series as well

I'm glad you said something. I was meaning to ask if you wanted to join our series but I have finals coming up so I haven't had that much free time.

- - - Updated - - -

On an unrelated note, now that we have more people involved in this I think we should get together sometime in the future and hammer out a definite story. We need to get down what each corp is and what their goals and personalitys are. Also we need to redivide to the planets up. Other than that I think the current resource system is working well and doesn't need to be changed.

I'm glad you said something. I was meaning to ask if you wanted to join our series but I have finals coming up so I haven't had that much free time.

- - - Updated - - -

On an unrelated note, now that we have more people involved in this I think we should get together sometime in the future and hammer out a definite story. We need to get down what each corp is and what their goals and personalitys are. Also we need to redivide to the planets up. Other than that I think the current resource system is working well and doesn't need to be changed.

I concur with this proposal.

The big thing is I also have finals coming up and I also have things like selecting a collage and stuff, so we will all have to find free time. May 20th is my final day, and after that this should get a new breath of life.

The big thing is I also have finals coming up and I also have things like selecting a collage and stuff, so we will all have to find free time. May 20th is my final day, and after that this should get a new breath of life.

Good. I'll be free at the back half of May too.

Also each faction has a little bonus below in something so militaristic corp ships are cheaper scientific= extra BP peaceful= cheaper restocking (most liked) trading= BP development quicker(trade materials) Also for no atmosphere penalty it should slowly go down to like 3/4 of original cost.

Also each faction has a little bonus below in something so militaristic corp ships are cheaper scientific= extra BP peaceful= cheaper restocking (most liked) trading= BP development quicker(trade materials) Also for no atmosphere penalty it should slowly go down to like 3/4 of original cost.

That would make it harder to balance properly, but we can look into it.
Just to let everyone know, we are updating to 1.0. I got some questions on the YouTube page and want to make that clear.
We hope to be releasing videos soon. I am very sorry for the wait. I feel like the author of game of thrones saying the dragons are coming.

We hope to be releasing videos soon. I am very sorry for the wait. I feel like the author of game of thrones saying the dragons are coming.

As they say quality before quantity.

As they say quality before quantity.

Exactly! Also keep in mind that when we are able to release the next episode, we will start off with a bang.
Too much hype XD

Exactly! Also keep in mind that when we are able to release the next episode, we will start off with a bang.

Hopefully more bang on your side than mine but we'll see.

Too much hype XD

I hope we can stay up to expectations :/

Just let me know ahead of time and I can update my schedule.

Well I am basically free after May 20th. Also early on friday days and I won't be reliably available on saturdays. I'll let you know about vacations and stuff.

Well I am basically free after May 20th. Also early on friday days and I won't be reliably available on saturdays. I'll let you know about vacations and stuff.

I'm free all day the month of May and later in the day in June and July.
Guys. Macey Dean is back!!!!

Guys. Macey Dean is back!!!!

He is back! I look forward to his videos!

However, this doesn't mean we are going to drop everything! This summer, expect a war.

He is back! I look forward to his videos!

However, this doesn't mean we are going to drop everything! This summer, expect a war.

Oh of course not!

This summer, the clash of corps!
War ye say? Well I'll have to get back to the drawing board *sighs* XD

War ye say? Well I'll have to get back to the drawing board *sighs* XD

As long as there is a second corp, there will be war.
B.I.R.C.S Has no interest in waging war, however, "War is good for business. It's just that the closer you get to it the less profitable it is..."

B.I.R.C.S Has no interest in waging war, however, "War is good for business. It's just that the closer you get to it the less profitable it is..."

That would be the point of the merchant roles. They also want to keep the war coming to make much more money. Essentially they make profit off of each ship, repair costs, and fuel costs.

BTW: What if we implemented a price to move from planet to planet? To pay for fuel and such. It would mean you would have to be a lot smarter about where you originally sent your ships. That or we could add some sort of travel delay turn. What doyou guys think?
